justification: Mentions B needs wins, but misreads B’s values: calls an Out tier-5 WR a weekly starter and ignores B’s preference for consistency. Labels Noah Brown a “stud” while offering A’s tier-1 RB, which A likely shouldn’t trade given RB depth and existing TE strength. Little separation of A’s ceiling-chasing goals from B’s reliability focus. Trade is feasible and might appeal to B due to a big RB upgrade, but rationale is generic and fact-light.
